comments:
Description:
NPE when render attached report with Engine API.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Using RunTask to get report document from attached report
2. Using RenderTask to get html output from document

Result:

This bug ouccors when user doesn't provide base url to create url of drillthrough. So engine provide a default base url.
